parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Pass an asset id to load a record, true to create a record, or false to validate a record configuration

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: Item record the asset was generated from

members.name: uniqueTemplate
members.description: Template to compare objects to search results

members.name: customers
members.description: Customers available to be serviced by the current Asset. The current record model and the selected Asset model is in scope.

properties.name: autoname
properties.description: Auto generated name for the Asset. When this has a value, the Name is populated from this attribute. Overwrite this to disable autonaming or change the naming formula.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: Parent Asset this is a child of. Attributes defined in inheritFields will be sourced from the parent Asset.

properties.name: item
properties.description: Item the Asset is an instance of.

properties.name: customers
properties.description: Customers that are valid to create records against. Overwrite this to refer to Asset fields. When true all customers are available. When false no customers can be selected. When an id or list or ids, these customers are used. Otherwise differ to customers object.

properties.name: addressbook
properties.description: Customer address book associated with the Asset.

properties.name: addresstext
properties.description: Address of the asset. This is sourced from addressbook when present.

properties.name: latitude
properties.description: Latitude of the asset. This is calculated from the addresstext when present.

properties.name: longitude
properties.description: Longitude of the asset. This is calculated from the addresstext when present.
